about_the_game:
Rikua is a roguelike adventure where players are challenged to fight the AI insurgence by defeating enemies, platforming through obstacles, and overcoming boss fights, while getting immerse in the game story.

SURVIVE A CYBERPUNK FUTURE

Step into the shoes of an elite soldier in a dystopian world where a rogue AI threatens humanity. Navigate through intense sci-fi environments, each packed with procedurally generated sublevels filled with randomized enemies, traps, and surprises. Each run is different, with a unique layout and increasingly challenging bosses waiting at the end of every level.

CHOOSE YOUR BOONS, SHAPE YOUR DESTINY

Meet the CEO Gods—powerful entities offering boons that enhance your abilities and grant you the edge in combat. With every run, you'll choose from procedurally generated boons, making each playthrough a customized experience that suits your playstyle. Will you focus on agility, strength, or pure firepower?

RETURN STRONGER AFTER EVERY DEFEAT

Even in defeat, Rikua grows stronger. After every run, return to the main hub to upgrade your abilities, unlock new weapons, and interact with your allies to unravel the deeper mysteries of the world. The resources you collect during each journey will fuel your progression as you prepare for the next battle.
